LargeRelic_Tier1_Feather
GrandRelic_Tier1_Necklace
ExaltedRelic_Tier1_Book
Double Knives - Tempest - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Dense clouds barricaded the far horizons, cutting them into the imposing landcape of blackened mountains" - Euclides da Cunha
"Nuvens volumosas abarreiram ao longe os horizontes, recortando-os em relevos imponentes de montanhas negras". - Euclides da Cunha
“浓云如屏障般笼罩远方地平线，勾勒出一片如黑色山脉般雄伟肃穆的轮廓。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Double Knives - Tempest - Lightning and  Move Speed Damage Affix

Relics.name: Shadow Dash - Wheel of Death - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Canudos was very appropriately, in a circle, surrounded by mountains. (...) It was a vacuum. It did not exist. Transposed to that chain of mountains, no one was in sin any longer." - Euclides da Cunha
“Canudos tinha muito apropriadamente, em roda, uma cercadura de montanhas. (...) Era um vácuo. Não existia. Transposto aquele cordão de serras, ninguém mais pecava”. - Euclides da Cunha
“群山以近乎完美的圆形姿态拥抱着卡努杜斯。(...) 那里仿佛是一片虚无，仿佛并不存在于这世间。一旦踏入那片山脉之中，人们便洗去了所有罪孽。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: ShadowDash - Wheel of Death - Life Cost Affix

Relics.name: ExaltedRelic_Tier2
GrandRelic_Tier2
LargeRelic_Tier2
SmallRelic_Tier2
ExaltedRelic_Tier3
GrandRelic_Tier3
LargeRelic_Tier3
SmallRelic_Tier3
Split Shot - Blunderbuss - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "While the soldier aimed at them in sustained bursts, the bandits fumbled with their muskets (...) in the slow process of loading their crude weaponry." - Euclides da Cunha
“Enquanto o soldado os alvejava em descargas nutridas, os jagunços revolviam os aiós (...) no demorado processo de carga de seu armamento grosseiro”. - Euclides da Cunha
“当士兵对他们持续射击时，土匪们还在摆弄着老式步枪 (...) 笨拙地装填着那些粗糙的武器。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Split Shot - Blunderbuss - Charged Shot Affix

Relics.name: Repeater - Molten Relic - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The mountains are unearthed." - Euclides da Cunha
“Desenterram-se as montanhas”. - Euclides da Cunha
“群山已然被揭露。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Repeater - Molten Relic - Grenade On Hit Affix

Relics.name: Reflexes - Battered Sheath - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "He's as inconsistent as life is. It's only natural. Living is about adapting. Life created him in her likeness: barbaric, impulsive, abrupt..." - Euclides da Cunha
“É inconstante como ela. É natural que o seja. Viver é adaptar-se. Ela o talhou à sua imagem: bárbaro, impetuoso, abrupto…” - Euclides da Cunha
“他就像人生一样反复无常，这再自然不过了。活着，就是不断适应。生命按她自己的模样塑造了他：野蛮、冲动、突如其来...” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Reflexes - Battered Sheath - Bounce Affix

Relics.name: Shadow Dash - Skull of the Beast - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Backland, it's the force that pushes you back, yet quietly encircles you when you least anticipate. It's the unexpected embrace of the land." - Guimarães Rosa
“Sertão é isto: o senhor empurra para trás, mas de repente ele volta a rodear o senhor dos lados. Sertão é quando menos se espera”. - Guimarães Rosa
“荒原，就是会把你推回来，又在你最料想不到的时候悄然将你包围的力量。那是这片土地的意外之拥。” - 吉马朗伊斯·罗萨

intrinsicAffixes.name: Shadow Dash - Skull of the Beast - Hit Damage Bonus Affix

Relics.name: Repeater - Last Prayer - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Treading unknown paths, surrounded by wild and impoverished nature, our soldier, who is brave in the face of the enemy, becomes cowardly (...) within the ambushes." - Euclides da Cunha
“Trilhando veredas desconhecidas, envolto por uma natureza selvagem e pobre, o nosso soldado, que é corajoso na frente do inimigo, acobarda-se (...) dentro das tocaias”. - Euclides da Cunha
“踏上未知之路，四周是野性与贫瘠交织的原野。那位直面敌人、从不退缩的老兵，却在重重埋伏中变得 (...) 怯懦。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Repeater - Last Prayer - Explode on Kill Affix

Relics.name: Split Shot - Spearhead - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: “It is not Barbarism who threatens us, it is civilization that terrifies us.” - Euclides da Cunha
“Não é o bárbaro que nos ameaça, é a civilização que nos apavora”. - Euclides da Cunha
“真正令我们恐惧的并非野蛮，而是文明本身。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Split Shot - Spearhead - Pierce Affix

Relics.name: Reflexes - Delicate Rosary - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The peculiar sect (...) had its natural representatives in the truculent Baptists, capable of loading their murderous blunderbusses with the beads of rosaries." - Euclides da Cunha

“A seita esdrúxula (...) tinha os seus naturais representantes nos batistas truculentos, capazes de carregar os bacamartes homicidas com as contas
dos rosários”. - Euclides da Cunha
“这个特殊的教派 (...) 其最极端的代表，便是那些嗜血的浸礼教徒，他们甚至用念珠装填杀人的火铳。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Reflexes - Delicate Rosary - Mana Regen on Hit Affix

Relics.name: Double Knives - Bloody Thorn - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "While the 'caatinga' engulfs him; shortens his gaze; assaults and dazzles him; ensnares him in the thorny web." - Euclides da Cunha
“Ao passo que a caatinga o afoga; abrevia-lhe o olhar; agride-o e estonteia-o; enlaça-o na trama espinescente”. - Euclides da Cunha
“白色卡廷加将他吞没，模糊他的视线，用枝刺纠缠他、震慑他、困住他。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Double Knives - Bloody Thorn - Critical Bleeds Affix

Relics.name: The Old Bell - The Sacrificed - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The backlander is strong, above all." - Euclides da Cunha
“O Sertanejo é, antes de tudo, um forte”. - Euclides da Cunha
“荒原人最不缺的品质就是坚韧。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: The Old Bell - The Sacrificed - Life Cost to Damage Affix

Relics.name: Double Knives - Banner of Faith - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Someday, killing people will fall into disuse." - Guimarães Rosa
“Um dia ainda entra em desuso matar gente”. - Guimarães Rosa
“终有一天，杀戮将被时代所摒弃。” - 吉马朗伊斯·罗萨

intrinsicAffixes.name: Double Knives - Banner of Faith - Life Steal Affix

Relics.name: All Bullet Skills - Powder Bag - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "That incomparable land, even when embraced by droughts, bare and impoverished, (...) freely gives him saltpeter for the composition of gunpowder." - Euclides da Cunha
“Aquela incomparável terra, mesmo quando abrangida pelas secas, desnuda e empobrecida, (…) dá-lhe grátis em toda a parte o salitre para a composição da pólvora”. - Euclides da Cunha
“那片无与伦比的土地，即便被干旱笼罩，贫瘠荒凉，(...) 依旧慷慨地为他奉上配制火药所需的硝石。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: All Bullet Skills - Powder Bag - Physical Explode Ignited Affix

Relics.name: Repeater - Arapuca - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "To live is an ongoing negligence." - Guimarães Rosa
“Viver é um descuido prosseguido”. - Guimarães Rosa
“人生，本就是不断疏忽的过程。” - 吉马朗伊斯·罗萨

intrinsicAffixes.name: Repeater - Arapuca - Damage on Slowed Affix

Relics.name: The Old Bell - Unshakable Faith - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith." (1 John 5:4)
“O que é nascido de Deus vence o mundo; e esta é a vitória que vence o mundo: a nossa fé”. (1 João 5:4)
“因为凡从神生的，就胜过世界；使我们胜了世界的，就是我们的信心。” - (《约翰一书》第 5 章第 4 节)

intrinsicAffixes.name: The Old Bell - Unshakable Faith - Mana to Damage Affix

Relics.name: Slow Time - Poem Never Recited - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: A poem interrupted: its beauty, spilled, evaporated like a raindrop in the backland.
Um poema interrompido: sua beleza, derramada, evaporou como uma gota de chuva no sertão.
一首戛然而止的诗，美感顷刻倾泻，如荒原中一滴蒸发的雨滴。

intrinsicAffixes.name: Slow Time - Poem Never Recited - Applies Oiled Affix

Relics.name: Slow Time - Death Notary - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "We are condemned to civilization. Either we progress or we disappear." - Euclides da Cunha
"Estamos condenados à civilização. Ou progredimos, ou desaparecemos". - Euclides da Cunha
“我们注定要走向文明，不是进步，就是灭亡。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Slow Time - Death Notary - Expose Enemies Affix

Relics.name: Shadow Dash - Skull of the Vulture - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "To live is very dangerous: it always ends in death." - Guimarães Rosa
“Viver é muito perigoso: sempre acaba em morte”. - Guimarães Rosa
“活着这件事很危险 - 它总是以死亡告终。” - 吉马朗伊斯·罗萨

intrinsicAffixes.name: Shadow Dash - Skull of the Vulture - Explode Bleeding Affix

Relics.name: Reflexes - Blue Calcite - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The cowboys recounted that on a clear night, a solitary bolt of lightning transformed an ordinary stone into a miracle." - Unknown Traveller
"Contaram os vaqueiros que, em noite de céu limpo, um raio solitário tornou em milagre uma pedra qualquer". - Viajante desconhecido
“牛仔们说，那天夜里晴空万里，一道孤闪将一块普通的石头变成了奇迹。” - 佚名旅者

intrinsicAffixes.name: Reflexes - Blue Calcite - Lightning Damage Conversion Affix

Relics.name: Reflexes - Caatinga Hunter - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The caatingas are an incorruptible ally of the rebellious backlander. (...) They weave themselves, impenetrable, to the outsider, but open (...) for the countryman who was born and raised there." - Euclides da Cunha

“...as caatingas são um aliado incorruptível do sertanejo em revolta. (...) Trançam-se, impenetráveis, ante o forasteiro, mas abrem-se (...) para o matuto que ali nasceu e cresceu”. - Euclides da Cunha
“...卡廷加是反叛的荒原人最忠诚的盟友。(...) 它对外人闭塞如铁，却会为 (...) 土生土长的乡民敞开怀抱。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Reflexes - Caatinga Hunter - Move Speed on Hit Affix

Relics.name: Shadow Dash - Skull of Wisdom - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The real is neither at the beginning nor at the end; it reveals itself to us in the midst of the journey." - Guimarães Rosa
“O real não está no início nem no fim, ele se mostra pra gente é no meio da travessia”. - Guimarães Rosa
“真实既不在起点，也不在终点，它只会在旅途中向我们显现。” - 吉马朗伊斯·罗萨

intrinsicAffixes.name: Shadow Dash - Skull of Wisdom - Hit Mana Bonus Affix

Relics.name: Closed Body - Martyr - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "But he was pierced for our transgressions,he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was on him, and by his wounds we are healed." - Isaiah 53:5
"Mas ele foi ferido por causa das nossas transgressões, e esmagado por causa das nossas iniquidades; o castigo que nos traz a paz estava sobre ele, e pelas suas feridas fomos curados". - Isaías 53:5

„Aber er wurde um unserer Übertretungen willen durchbohrt und um unserer Sünden willen zerschlagen. Die Strafe lag auf ihm, damit wir Frieden hätten, und durch seine Wunden sind wir geheilt.“ – Jesaja 53:5

intrinsicAffixes.name: Closed Body - Martyr - Missing Life Bonus Conviction

Relics.name: All Projectile Skills - Silver Bullets - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "And it was a rout. Eight hundred men disappeared in flight, abandoning their rifles. (...) At the first shots, the battalions dissolved." - Euclides da Cunha
"Oitocentos homens desapareciam em fuga, abandonando as espingardas. (...) Aos primeiros tiros os batalhões diluíram-se". - Euclides da Cunha
“那是一场溃败。八百人溃逃而散，连枪都没来得及带走。(...) 第一声枪响，整个营就崩了。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: All Bullet Skills - Silver Bullet - Conviction Damage Bonus Affix

Relics.name: Potion - Holy Water - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "At the height of summer, a Macambira plant is, for the thirsty backlander, a glass of crystal-clear and pure water." - Euclides da Cunha
"No pino dos verões, um pé de macambira é para o matuto sequioso um copo d’água cristalina e pura". - Euclides da Cunha
„Im Hochsommer ist eine Macambira-Pflanze für den durstigen Hinterlandbewohner ein Glas kristallklares und reines Wasser.“ – Euclides da Cunha

intrinsicAffixes.name: Potion - Conviction Regen

Relics.name: Slow Time - Mother of Perpetual Help - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "...Defend us from all dangers, both physical and spiritual. Grant us the strength to resist temptations and the courage to face the adversities of life." - Old Prayer
"...Defende-nos de todos os perigos, físicos e espirituais. Concede-nos a força para resistir às tentações e a coragem para enfrentar as adversidades da vida". - Oração antiga
“...护佑我们脱离一切身心之患，赐予我们抵御诱惑的力量和面对苦难的勇气。” - 古老的祈祷经文

intrinsicAffixes.name: Slow Time - Player Barrier Buff Affix

Relics.name: SmallRelic_Tier1_Cross
LargeRelic_Tier1_Bull
GrandRelic_Tier1_WoodenImage
ExaltedRelic_Tier1_Poster
Double Knives - Scouts Medal - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The modern Templars (...) all had a bronze medal hanging on their left chest, bearing the image of Marshal Floriano Peixoto, and when they died, they saluted his memory." - Euclides da Cunha
"Os modernos templários (...) tinham todos colgada ao peito esquerdo em medalhas de bronze, a efígie do marechal Floriano Peixoto e, morrendo, saudavam a sua memória". - Euclides da Cunha
“这门重型火炮本为守护海岸要塞的宁静而打造。(...) 然而，如今却必须用这钢铁怪物来恐吓荒原。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Double Knives - Scouts Medal - No Move Speed Penalty Affix

Relics.name: Holy Rosary - Crown of Thorns - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The thorny crown, which was only set upon the head of Our Redeemer in order that all the thorns of the world might be gathered together and broken." - Cassiodorus
"A coroa de espinhos, que foi colocada sobre a cabeça de Nosso Redentor apenas para que todos os espinhos do mundo pudessem ser reunidos e quebrados." - Cassiodorus
“那顶荆棘王冠，是为我们的救世主而戴，为聚拢世间一切苦难与荆棘，并将它们尽数折断。”- 卡西奥多罗斯

intrinsicAffixes.name: Holy Rosary - Crown of Thorns - Physical Damage Affix

Relics.name: Reflexes - Mandacaru - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "When the mandacaru blooms in the drought / it is a sign that the rain is coming to the backlands." - Luiz Gonzaga
"Mandacaru quando fulora na seca / É o sinal que a chuva chega no sertão". - Luiz Gonzaga
“曼达卡鲁在旱季开花。那是雨水即将降临荒原的预兆。” - 路易斯·贡扎加

intrinsicAffixes.name: Reflexes - Mandacaru - Damage Against Bleeding Affix

Relics.name: Judgement - Memorial Candle - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Seven days is the necessary time for the work to crystallize in the spiritual realm. In the morning we renew the request, at night we give thanks." - Caboclo Nharauê
"Sete dias é o tempo necessário para que o trabalho cristalize no plano espiritual. De manhã renovamos o pedido, à noite agradecemos". - Caboclo Nharauê
“七日乃灵界修行术成之期。清晨祈愿，夜晚感恩。” - 卡博克罗·尼哈劳埃

intrinsicAffixes.name: Judgement - Memorial Candle - Persistent AoE Affix

Relics.name: Bombardment - Colonels Insignia - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "He faced danger serenely, within the terrifying target of his own uniform, openly exposed to the enemy's shots, who preferred to target the leaders." - Euclides da Cunha
"Encarava serenamente os perigos dentro do alvo tremendo da própria farda, francamente exposto nos tiros do inimigo, que visava de preferência os chefes". - Euclides da Cunha
“他沉着面对危险，穿着醒目的军服站在敌军火力的正中央，敌人总是优先狙击将领。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Bombardment - Colonels Insignia - Follow Caster Affix

Relics.name: The Old Bell - Toll of the Dead - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "His voice barely leaves his throat, almost imperceptible. He cannot be interrogated, he may not live until tomorrow." - Euclides da Cunha
"A voz sai-lhe da garganta imperceptível quase. Não pode ser interrogado, não viverá talvez até amanhã". - Euclides da Cunha
“他几乎无法发声，只能在喉间低语，难以辨听。他不能被审问，也许撑不到明天。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: The Old Bell - Toll of the Dead - Summon Companion Affix

Relics.name: Summon The Guard - Call of the Guard - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The fanatical mob, shouting 'Bom Jesus' and 'The Counselor,' and the shrill whistles of wooden flutes (...) crossed the lake wildly." - Euclides da Cunha
"A turba fanatizada, entre vivas ao 'Bom Jesus' e ao 'Conselheiro', e silvos estridentes de apitos de taquara (...) atravessou o lago arrebatadamente". - Euclides da Cunha
“那支狂热的队伍高喊着‘仁慈的耶稣’与‘长老’，伴随着木笛的尖啸声 (...) 疯狂地穿越湖面。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon The Guard - Call of the Guard - Double Companions on Activation

Relics.name: Lasso - Northerner Belt - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Covered by the wide-brimmed hat with large flexible flaps, and with a pistol and a knife flashing at his waist, fastened by a belt." - Euclides da Cunha
"Coberto pelo sombreiro de enormes abas flexíveis, e tendo à cinta, rebrilhando, presas pela guaiaca, a pistola e a faca". - Euclides da Cunha
“宽沿软檐的帽子遮住面容，腰间挎着手枪与匕首，在皮带上闪出寒光。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Lasso - Northerner Belt - Cast on Crit Affix

Relics.name: Veil of Quills - Mark of the Vulture - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The plague of a skinny vulture does not kill a fat horse." - Popular saying
"Praga de urubu magro não mata cavalo gordo". - Ditado popular
“瘦秃鹫的毒爪，伤不了壮马。” - 民间谚语

intrinsicAffixes.name: Veil of Quills - Mark of the Vulture - Stack and Explode Affix

Relics.name: All Spell Skills - Bloodied Doll - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Grenades exploded in the tiny rooms, shattering men, women, and children upon whom sometimes fell the heavy clay ceiling, (...) like the slab of a tomb." - Euclides da Cunha
"As granadas explodiam nos quartos minúsculos despedaçando homens, mulheres e crianças sobre os quais descia, às vezes, o pesado teto de argila, (...) como a laje de um túmulo". - Euclides da Cunha
“手榴弹在狭小的房间内爆炸，将男人、女人与孩童炸得粉碎，有时还有沉重的土砖天花板一并压下 (...) 就像一块坟墓的石板。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: All Spell Skills - Bloodied Doll - Additional Damage Per Summon Affix

Relics.name: Judgement - Book of Sin - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "And there arose much godlessness, and they committed fornication, and they were led astray, and became corrupt in all their ways." - 1 Enoch 8:2
"E surgiu muita impiedade, e cometeram fornicação, e foram desviados, e se corromperam em todos os seus caminhos". - 1 Enoque 8:2
“世人开始悖逆，犯下淫行，迷失正道，堕落于万象之中。” - 《以诺一书》第 8 章第 2 节

intrinsicAffixes.name: Judgement - Book of Sin - Cast on Kill Debuffed Target Affix

Relics.name: All Spell Skills - Written Promise - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "He who promises nothing owes nothing." - Popular saying
Quem nada promete, nada deve". - Ditado popular
“不许诺，便无所亏。” - 民间谚语

intrinsicAffixes.name: All Spell Skills - Written Promise - Additional Damage Per Conviction Affix

Relics.name: Holy Rosary - Bead Necklace - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Divine Jesus, we offer You this Rosary that we are about to pray, meditating on the mysteries of Your Redemption." - Prayer of Offering of the Rosary
"Divino Jesus, nós Vos oferecemos este Terço que vamos rezar, meditando nos mistérios da Vossa Redenção". - Oração de Oferecimento do Terço
"神圣的耶稣，我们向你献上这串念珠，借之诵念，默想神救赎的奥秘。" - 念珠祈祷经文

intrinsicAffixes.name: Holy Rosary - Bead Necklace - Cast on Move Distance Affix

Relics.name: Holy Rosary - Golden Chaplet - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Praying the Rosary is lighting a light in the darkness of the soul." - Unknown believer
"Rezar o rosário é acender uma luz na escuridão da alma". - Crente desconhecido
“以念珠祈祷，如同在灵魂的黑暗中点燃一束光。” - 无名信徒

intrinsicAffixes.name: Holy Rosary - Golden Chaplet - Orbit Around Target Affix

Relics.name: Holy Rosary - Workers Tools - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Through the complicated movement of the machines, we hear the sovereign orchestration of labor, encouraging and strong." - Euclides da Cunha
"Através da movimentação complicada das máquinas, ouvimos a orquestração soberana do trabalho, alentadora e forte". - Euclides da Cunha
“透过机器复杂的运转，我们聆听到那宏大而有力的劳动交响曲，令人振奋，响彻心扉。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Holy Rosary - Workers Tools - Use Summon as Target Affix

Relics.name: Veil of Quills - Feathered Dagger - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "I dunno why I’ve never seen a man blushing in front of me." - Lampião, while bleeding with a dagger the policemen captured by his gang.
"Num sei pruquê eu nunca vi home corado na minha frente." - Lampião, enquanto sangrava com punhal policiais capturados pelo seu bando.
“不知道为何，我从未见过男人在我面前脸红。” - 匪王兰皮昂用匕首刺伤被其团伙俘获的警察时说道。

intrinsicAffixes.name: Veil of Quills - Feathered Dagger - Pierce Affix

Relics.name: Lasso - Barbed Wire - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Lighter than air, stronger than whiskey, cheaper than dust." - John Warne Gates
"Mais leve que ar, mais forte que uísque, mais barato que pó". - John Warne Gates
“比空气更轻盈，比烈酒更醇烈，比尘土更低贱。” - 约翰·沃恩·盖茨

intrinsicAffixes.name: Lasso - Barbed Wire - Guaranteed Bleed Affix

Relics.name: All Spells - Looking Glass - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The best mirror is the gaze of an old friend." - Popular saying
"O melhor espelho é o olhar de um velho amigo". - Ditado popular
“最好的镜子是老友的目光。” - 民间谚语

intrinsicAffixes.name: All Spell Skills - Looking Glass - Mana Regen on Kill Affix

Relics.name: Summon the Guard - Stolen Weapons - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Skeletons dressed in tattered and worn uniforms (...) betrayed a demonic performance deliberately engineered by the backlanders. They had taken nothing from them, except the ammunition and weapons." - Euclides da Cunha
"Esqueletos vestidos de fardas poentas e rotas (...) delatavam demoníaca encenação adrede engenhada pelos jagunços. Nada lhes haviam tirado, excluídas as munições e as armas." - Euclides da Cunha
“身着破烂制服的骷髅 (...) 暴露了荒原人精心策划的恶魔般的表演。他们只拿走了弹药和武器，其他一无所取。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon The Guard - Stolen Weapons - Alternative Attack using Splitshot

Relics.name: Lasso - Bundle of Rope - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "They wear blue clothes, their waists bound by ropes of pure linen; they never change this sacred uniform." - Euclides da Cunha
"Vestem roupas azuis, cingidas as cinturas por cordas de linho alvíssimo; não variam nunca este uniforme consagrado". - Euclides da Cunha
“他们身着蓝衣，腰系洁白亚麻绳索。他们从不更换这神圣的制服。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Lasso - Bundle of Rope - Lifelink on Hit Affix

Relics.name: Bombardment - Ashes of Mourning - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "On the emaciated bodies and tattered clothes, one could read the sufferings endured (...) incinerated, they were outlined, clear, with the whiteness of the ashes fading on the dusty, brown ground." - Euclides da Cunha
"Nos corpos emagrecidos e nas vestes em pedaços, liam-se as provações sofridas (...) incinerados, se desenhavam, nítidos, esbatida a brancura das cinzas no chão poento e pardo". - Euclides da Cunha
“他们身形消瘦，衣衫褴褛，满是苦难的痕迹 (...) 被焚烧殆尽之后，只余下一道道清晰轮廓，在尘土飞扬的褐色土地上，泛着灰白的余烬。” - 欧克利迪斯·达·库尼亚

intrinsicAffixes.name: Bombardment - Ashes of Mourning - Plague Damage and Cooldown on Hit Affix

Relics.name: All Skills - Spiked Chains - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "He brought them out of darkness, the utter darkness, and broke away their chains." - Psalm 107:14
"Tirou-os das trevas e sombra da morte e quebrou as suas correntes". - Salmos 107:14
“他从黑暗和死荫里领他们出来，折断他们的绑索。” - 《诗篇》第 107 章第 14 节

intrinsicAffixes.name: All Skills - Spiked Chains - Bleeding Enemies Less Damage Affix

Relics.name: Shadow Dash - Death Worship - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The government's Robocop is cold, feels no pity / Only hate and laughs like a hyena / Pewpewpew, Fleury and his gang / Will swim in a pool of blood." - Racionais MC's
"O Robocop do governo é frio, não sente pena / Só ódio e ri como a hiena / Ratatatá, Fleury e sua gangue / Vão nadar numa piscina de sangue". - Racionais MC's
“政府的机器战警冷酷无情，毫无怜悯之心 / 只有仇恨，像鬣狗一样大笑 / 拉塔塔塔、弗勒里和他的团伙 / 将在血泊中游泳。” - Racionais MC's

intrinsicAffixes.name: ShadowDash - Death Worship - Add Melee Tag Affix

Relics.name: Matadeira - Cafezinho - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Life is sad and complicated. (...) The solution is to go have a coffee." - Rubem Braga
"A vida é triste e complicada. (...) O remédio é ir tomar um cafezinho". - Rubem Braga
“生活是悲伤而复杂的。(...)解决办法就是去喝杯咖啡。” - 鲁本·布拉加

intrinsicAffixes.name: Matadeira - Cafezinho - Extra Charges Affix Definition

Relics.name: Matadeira - Cannonball - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "A rolling stone gathers no moss." - Popular saying
"Pedra que rola não cria limo". - Ditado popular
“滚石不生苔。” - 流行说法

intrinsicAffixes.name: Matadeira - Cannonball - Physical Single Instance Area Definition

Relics.name: Feitors Lash - Ancestral Memory - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Photography: A weapon of love, justice and knowledge." - Carlos Drummond de Andrade
"Fotografia: arma de amor, de justiça e conhecimento". - Carlos Drummond de Andrade
“摄影：爱、正义和知识的武器。” - 卡洛斯·德拉蒙德·德·安德拉德

intrinsicAffixes.name: Feitors Lash - Ancestral Memory - Recast with Summon Affix Definition

Relics.name: Feitors Lash - Settle the Score - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Propaganda is to a democracy what the bludgeon is to a totalitarian state." - Noam Chomsky
"A propaganda representa para a democracia aquilo que o cassetete significa para o estado totalitário". - Noam Chomsky
“宣传之于民主，就如同警棍之于极权国家。” - 诺姆·乔姆斯基

intrinsicAffixes.name: Feitors Lash - Settle the Score - Third Strike Bonus Affix Definition

Relics.name: Feitors Lash - Burning Shackles - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "In these new times, despite the punishments / We are on the scene, we are on the streets, breaking the shackles." - Ivan Lins
"No novo tempo, apesar dos castigos / Estamos em cena, estamos nas ruas, quebrando as algemas". - Ivan Lins
“在新的时代，尽管有惩罚/我们在现场，我们在街头，打破枷锁。” - 伊万·林斯

intrinsicAffixes.name: Feitors Lash - Burning Shackles - Explode Ignite Affix Definition

Relics.name: Prayer of Health - Righteous Blade - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "May knives and swords break / Without touching my body (...) Because I am dressed in the clothes / And the weapons of George." - Racionais MC's
"Facas e espadas se quebrem / Sem o meu corpo tocar (...) Pois eu estou vestido com as roupas / E as armas de Jorge". - Racionais MC's
“刀剑折断/无需触及我的身体（...）因为我穿着豪尔赫的衣服/和武器。” - Racionais MC's

intrinsicAffixes.name: Prayer of Health - Righteous Blade - Fire Damage Aura Affix

Relics.name: Prayer of Health - Saviours Shield - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "In a fire, one can call for God or the firemen, but the arrival of only one of them depends on faith." - Unknown author
"Num incêndio, se chama por Deus ou pelos bombeiros, mas a chegada de só um deles depende da fé". - Autor desconhecido
“在火灾中，你会呼唤上帝或消防员，但只有其中一个人的到来取决于信仰。” - 作者不详

intrinsicAffixes.name: Prayer of Health - Saviours Shield - Reduced Damage From Ignited Affix

Relics.name: Prayer of Health - Heads or Tails - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Between heads or tails, it's better to get the coin." - Popular saying
"Entre a cara e a coroa, é melhor ficar com a moeda". - Ditado popular
“不管是正面还是反面，最好还是保留这枚硬币。” - 流行说法

intrinsicAffixes.name: Prayer of Health - Heads or Tails - Second Wind Chance Affix

Relics.name: Passage - Energy Box - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "He's faithful, he's one hundred percent / He's a warrior, he's full of energy / He's a brother, a 90 bingo ball / He's ours, he's family." - Seu Jorge
"É fiel, é cem por cento / É guerreiro, é bom de pilha / É irmão, pedra noventa / Ele é nosso, ele é família". - Seu Jorge
“他忠诚，他百分之百忠诚/他是一名战士，他是一个好炮手/他是一位兄弟，一位九十岁的老人/他是我们的，他是家人。” - 豪尔赫先生

intrinsicAffixes.name: Passage - Energy Box - Plague Area On Finish Affix

Relics.name: Passage - Ticket - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Who will cry, who will smile? / Who will stay, who will leave? / Because the train is arriving / It's arriving at the station / It's the seven o'clock train / It's the last one in the backlands." - Raul Seixas
"Quem vai chorar, quem vai sorrir? / Quem vai ficar, quem vai partir? / Pois o trem está chegando / Tá chegando na estação / É o trem das sete horas / É o último do sertão". - Raul Seixas
“谁会哭，谁会笑？/谁会留下，谁会离开？/因为火车即将到达/它即将到达车站/这是七点的火车/这是内陆地区的最后一班火车。” - 劳尔·塞克萨斯

intrinsicAffixes.name: Passage - Ticket - Teleport All Summons Affix

Relics.name: Passage - Peace and Quiet - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Whoever saves himself in this ember, who lights a new fire / Overcomes the crisis, reaps calm, brings joy to the soul of these people / Lives in peace and harmony, opens the door to joy." - Caetano Veloso
"Quem se salva nessa brasa, quem acende um fogo novo / Cruza a crise, colhe a calma, alegra a alma desse povo / Vive em paz e harmonia, abre a porta da alegria". - Caetano Veloso
“谁能在余烬中自救，谁就能点燃新的火焰/克服危机，收获平静，给这些人的灵魂带来欢乐/生活在和平与和谐中，打开通往欢乐的大门。” - 卡埃塔诺·维洛索

intrinsicAffixes.name: Passage - Peace and Quiet - Conviction for Near Enemies Affix

Relics.name: Summon Marksmen - Future Weapon - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Nightmare is a compliment / For those who live in war, peace never existed / In a hot climate, my people sweat cold / I saw a little Black kid, his notebook was a rifle." Racionais MC's
"Pesadelo é um elogio / Pra quem vive na guerra, a paz nunca existiu / Num clima quente, a minha gente sua frio  / Vi um pretinho, seu caderno era um fuzil" Racionais MC's
“噩梦是一种赞美 / 对于那些生活在战争中的人来说，和平从未存在过 / 在炎热的气候下，我的人民冷汗直流 / 我看到一个黑人小男孩，他的笔记本是一把步枪” Racionais MC's

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon Marksmen - Future Weapon - Bounce Shot Affix

Relics.name: Prayer of Vengeance - Garrison Supplies - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "The black guy stepped on top of the hill, picked up his guitar and played for the people / And for the people of crime, who were arriving and slowly placing their weapons on the ground." - O Rappa
"O nego pisou no topo do morro, pegou sua viola e tocou pro povo / E pro povo do crime, que foi chegando e colocando as suas armas devagar no chão". - O Rappa
“黑人走上山顶，拿起吉他，为人民演奏/也为犯罪分子演奏，他们到达后慢慢地将武器放在地上。” - 拉帕

intrinsicAffixes.name: Prayer of Vengeance - Garrison Supplies - Marksman Projectile Amount Affix

Relics.name: Summon Marksmen - Summoning of Earth - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "If the Earth gets sick, we get sick too. There's no way we can be healthy people if the planet is all broken." - Ailton Krenak
"Se a terra adoecer, nós adoecemos junto. Não tem jeito de sermos pessoas saudáveis com o planeta todo quebrado". - Ailton Krenak
“如果地球生病了，我们也会生病。如果地球彻底崩溃，我们就不可能健康。” - 艾尔顿·克雷纳克

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon Marksmen - Summoning of Earth - Phys Res Shred Affix

Relics.name: Summon Marksmen - Summoning of Air - Unique Grand Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Nature is our lungs. If we destroy nature, we will no longer be able to survive, we will no longer have air to breathe." - Chief Raoni
"A natureza é nosso pulmão. Se acabar com a natureza, não conseguiremos mais sobreviver, não vamos ter mais ar para respirar". - Cacique Raoni
“大自然是我们的肺。如果我们破坏大自然，我们将无法生存，我们将没有空气可以呼吸。” - 拉奥尼酋长

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon Marksmen - Summoning of Air - Light Res Shred Affix

Relics.name: Prayer of Vengeance - Final Reckoning - Unique Small Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "What is silence like? / And in that moment, everything must be silent / In a story, that comes from the people, the final judgment" - Zé Ramalho
"Como é o silêncio? / E nesse momento, tudo deve calar / Numa história, que venha do povo, o juízo final" - Zé Ramalho
“沉默是什么样的？/在那一刻，一切都必须沉默/在一个来自人民的故事里，最后的审判”——泽·拉马略

intrinsicAffixes.name: Prayer of Vengeance - Final Reckoning - Explosion on Second Wind Affix

Relics.name: Summon Brute - Blood Money - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: Imagine living in a country where promises are just excuses to live with impunity / Of your frauds, your lack of morality, your dirty money! - Gritando HC
Imagina viver num país onde promessas são apenas desculpas pra viver impune / De suas falcatruas, a sua falta de moralidade, seu dinheiro sujo! - Gritando HC
想象一下生活在这样一个国家，在这里，承诺只是逍遥法外的借口/因为你的欺诈、你的缺乏道德、你的肮脏钱财！ - 喊HC

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon Brute - Blood Money - Instant Respawn Life Cost Affix

Relics.name: Summon Brute - Breath Mask - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Those who have the gift of caring for others know how to feel the pain of others and never abandon them." - Mônica Calazans, the first person vaccinated against Covid-19 in Brazil
"Quem tem um dom de cuidar do outro sabe sentir a dor do outro e jamais o abandona". - Mônica Calazans, primeira pessoa vacinada contra a Covid-19 no Brasil
“那些具有关爱他人天赋的人知道如何感受他人的痛苦并且永远不会抛弃他们。” - 莫妮卡·卡拉赞斯 (Mônica Calazans)，巴西首位接种新冠疫苗的人

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon Brute - Breath Mask - Conviction on Death Affix

Relics.name: Summon Brute - Disorientation - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "Tear gas, stun grenades / Rubber bullets to the face, police repression / In violent conflict, civil disobedience / Walking against the wind, manly patriotism" - Ratos de Porão
"Gás lacrimogêneo, bomba de efeito moral / Bala de borracha na cara, repressão policial / No conflito violento, desobediência civil / Caminhando contra o vento, patriotada varonil" - Ratos de Porão
“催泪瓦斯、眩晕手榴弹 / 橡皮子弹射脸、警察镇压 / 暴力冲突、公民抗命 / 迎风而行、男子汉爱国主义”——拉托斯·德·波朗

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon Brute - Disorientation - Explode on Death Affix

Relics.name: All Skills - Bundle of Syringes - Unique Large Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: "It's booze, it's a pipe, it's a syringe, it's a beating, a beating / It's always been like this since the beginning / These guys only cause tragedies for me." - Magoo and O Bando Urtiga
"É pinga, cachimbo, é seringa, é porrada, porrada / Desde o começo sempre foi assim / Esses caras só promovem tragédias pra mim". - Magoo e O Bando Urtiga
“酒精、烟斗、注射器、殴打、殴打/从一开始就一直这样/这些家伙只会给我带来悲剧。” - 马古和荨麻帮

intrinsicAffixes.name: All Skills - Bundle of Syringes - Buff on Lifesteal Affix

Relics.name: Summon Brute - Voice of War - Unique Exalted Relic

loreLocalizationKey.langTranslation: It's not just about seeing and judging / It has to be about mixing / Then you'll see that it's us / That rap is voice, that reggae is voice and samba - Emicida & Rael da Rima
Não é só ver e julgar / Tem que ser pra se misturar / Aí vai ver que é nois / Que o rap é voz, que o reggae é voz e o samba - Emicida & Rael da Rima
这不仅仅是观察和判断 / 这必须是关于混合 / 然后你会看到那就是我们 / 说唱是声音，雷鬼是声音，桑巴是声音 - Emicida 和 Rael da Rima

intrinsicAffixes.name: Summon Brute - Voice of War - Summon Damage Buff Affix
